analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x53952e122b1529f8b77597c8d05347262ab577cb.sol#426-442) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/33/0x53952e122b1529f8b77597c8d05347262ab577cb.sol#438-439)

SovTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x53952e122b1529f8b77597c8d05347262ab577cb.sol#488-511) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/33/0x53952e122b1529f8b77597c8d05347262ab577cb.sol#503-505)
	-token.mint(POOL,tokens / 2) (/unique_chucks/33/0x53952e122b1529f8b77597c8d05347262ab577cb.sol#509)
